body_html: @guitarmind I can also confirm that this worked for me! This is huge, I spent ages and ages trying to solve this while having cudnn 5.1 because every single guide said that cudnn 6 doesn't work, but in reality cudnn 6 is required for the current tensorflow-gpu 1.3.0

body: @guitarmind I can also confirm that this worked for me! This is huge, I spent ages and ages trying to solve this while having cudnn 5.1 because every single guide said that cudnn 6 doesn't work, but in reality cudnn 6 is required for the current tensorflow-gpu 1.3.0
